EmailTemplate.name: NE London Youth Board 2015-16 session reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Our next Youth Board session...
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello all,
I am back and ready to hear about all the work the Youth Board has been doing whist I was away! The next meeting will be on Tuesday 1st March, 5 - 7pm at 639 Enterprises Center, 639 High Rd, N17 8AA.
Please reply to me with your name and 'Yes' if you are attending or 'No' if not, by 2pm on Friday 26th February.
Some important information that we have received about the event:
Timings: The event will have to take place from 11am till 4pm. Resources: Resources will have to be bought on the day however there might be an opportunity to buy some resources in advance. Budget: You have a budget of £260 however I have heard that you have applied for O2 Think Big funding of £450 and it has been successful which is amazing. This will give you a total budget of £710 which is a lot of money. I am so proud of you all. Promotion: Keep promoting the event so that lots of people attend.
See you soon!
Rahul Malde The Challenge
